    Spatial model that is described by the unit square (i.e. [0,1] x [0,1])

    • Method Detail

      • isWithinBoundaries

        public boolean isWithinBoundaries(java.awt.geom.Point2D pointToCheck)
        Description copied from class: RectangularSpatialModel
        Method to check whether a point lies within the boundaries of the spatial model. A point lies within the space described by the RectangularSpatialModel when it lies within a rectangular box of given width and height around the centered coordinates (i.e. x in [longitudeCentred - width/2.0, longitudeCentred + width/2.0] and y in [latitudeCentred - height/2.0,latitudeCentred + height/2.0].
        Overrides:
        isWithinBoundaries in class RectangularSpatialModel
        Parameters:
        pointToCheck - The coordinates to check the box with
        Returns:
        true if the point lies within the box (including corners), false otherwise
